title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install from PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker with one command.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama HTTP API with prompts and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-chat (PyPI)
summary: Minimal PyPI package exposing a simple synchronous chat helper around ollama-python.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, JSON mode, vision, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users via any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that proxies to Ollama; includes RAG via Chroma and PDF loader.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that summarises blocks or brainstorms ideas using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; import via github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to an Ollama model.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks with Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval and generation.
